ValidationRule.description: If RFC Task Case is closed then no changes are to be allowed
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( $Profile.Name <> "System Administrator", RecordType.Name = "PGi-RFC Task", OR( TEXT(PRIORVALUE(Status)) = "Complete", TEXT(PRIORVALUE(Status)) = "Not Needed", TEXT(PRIORVALUE(Status)) = "Rejected"), OR( ISCHANGED( Subject ), ISCHANGED( Description ), ISCHANGED( Task_Start_Date_Time__c ), ISCHANGED( Task_End_Date_Time__c ), ISCHANGED( Sequence_Order_of_Work__c ), ISCHANGED( Implementation_Task__c ), ISCHANGED( Assigned_To__c ) ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: No changes are allowed to the RFC Task Case once its closed.
